patterns: what should I call you chatbot?
responses: I'm Amazin, How can I help you with?
Hey!I'm Amazin, How can I help you?
All goods sold by Amazin are 100% genuine and in the original manufacturer’s packaging (unless explicitly stated in the product listing).
Find tracking information and order details by clicking here.If you want to check the status of your order through Alexa, simply say Alexa,where's my stuff?

patterns: How can I cancel my order?
responses: If you wish to cancel your order please notify Amazin in your Amazin account within 1 hour of making your order.Please include the following details:Your Name, Your Order Number, Reason for cancellation, Payment Method.The refund will be applied directly to your debit/credit card or paypal account.

patterns: How do I return my order?
How can i give you back the product
responses: You can return your package using a label from Your Orders.Return Shipping Costs unless your item is eligible for Free Returns, if you return an item using the return label from Your Orders, and the reason for return is not a result of an Amazin.ca error, we'll deduct the cost of return shipping from your refund. If you choose the Canada Post option, the amount that we'll deduct from your refund is displayed. If you choose the self-return option, you'll pay the cost charged by the carrier selected.For more information about refunds and refund amounts, go to Refunds and Exchanges.

patterns: When a refund will issue to me
where is my money, I sent the product to you
I havent received my refund money
responses: Upon receipt of your return, Amazin will issue a refund within 3-5 working days* starting from the date your return is received.

patterns: How can I subscribe to the Subscribe and Save?
responses: 1.Select Subscribe & Save on the product page for thousands of products in the Subscribe & Save Store.2.Select the quantity and schedule that works for you, from every 2 weeks to 6 months. 3.Create your subscription. Sit back, relax, we will take care of the rest. Shipping is always free. Subscribe more. Save more.

patterns: How can I sell in Amazin?
What are the steps to sell on Amazin
responses: You can use Seller Central as the web interface used to manage all aspects of your Selling on Amazin account. You can add product information, make inventory updates, manage orders, manage payments, and evaluate sales performance through a suite of web-based and downloadable tools. You have three options for submitting product-related data: 1-Use the Add a Product feature on Seller Central to create one product at a time. 2-Use inventory files to upload multiple products simultaneously. 3-Integrate your system with Amazin's catalogue using Amazin Marketplace Web Services(MWS).

patterns: What can I do if my phone number changed?
What can I do if my mobile number changed?
What can I do if my cellphone changed?
My e-mail address or mobile phone number changed?
responses: If you no longer use the e-mail address associated with your Amazin account, you may contact Customer Service for help restoring access to your account.

patterns: How can I replaced my product
I need a replacement for my item
My order is physically damaged and in defective condition, how can I replace it?
My item is different from the description on the product detail page, I want to replace it
I need to return my product it has a missing parts and accessories, How can I exchange it?
responses: Only Fulfilled by Amazin items, Prime eligible items and few Seller Fulfilled items can be replaced. If the item you ordered arrived in a physically damaged or defective condition or is different from their description on the product detail page, or has missing parts or accessories, it will be eligible for a free replacement, provided the exact item is available with the same seller. For more details, please see Amazin.in Replacement Policy.

patterns: How can I return a gift?
Can a give you back a gift?
responses: Please visit the Gift Returns option and enter the Order id to initiate a return. You can also return a gift item in exchange for an Amazin Pay Gift Card, if the gift giver has sent a Gift Receipt to you. For guidance on returning a gift item using a gift receipt, please see Gift Receipts on Amazin website.
